articles.description: Director Guy Nattiv also talks about releasing his film while Israelis are protesting the current Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s attempt to reform the judiciary: "Golda believed in the high court."
articles.content: When Guy Nattiv came on board to direct Golda — centered on the first and only female Prime Minister of Israel Golda Meir — he knew he didn’t want to make a war movie, despite the film being set duri… [+7717 chars]

articles.author: Zoe Guy
articles.title: Priscilla Presley Biopic: Cast, Trailer, Release Date - Vulture
articles.description: The trailer for Sofia Coppola’s upcoming film ‘Priscilla’ stars Cailee Spaeny and Jacob Elordi. The biopic tells the story about Priscilla Presley’s wife and her marriage to Elvis. ‘Priscilla’ is coming to theaters on October 27.
articles.content: Sofia Coppola is back with another historical film about a yearning teenage girl. But this time, the subject is Priscilla Presley, played by Cailee Spaeny. Just one surprisingly short year after Aust… [+2924 chars]
